attributes.action: Ensure Greenbelt Group are no longer allowed to trade unfairly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Greenbelt Group are a factoring company who currently work on many private estates around Britain.  For many years residence committees around Britain have been trying to highlight the fact that this company have and still are charging residents for work that has never been done, or has been completed to a very poor standard. We Would like to highlight this and put a stop to  actions currently undertaken by this company and ensure this sort of working practices, are stopped once and for all.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
